values: Call Upon Me in the Day of Trouble and I Will Deliver YouCall Upon Me in the Day of Trouble and I Will Deliver You

Be thankful, pay your vows,
      call for help. And when God delivers you from the day of
      trouble, glorify him with all your heart.
      Be thankful, pay your vows,
    call for help. And when God delivers you from the day of
    trouble, glorify him with all your heart.
